com.mygdx.game.entity

Class Character

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.game.entity.Character
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    NPC, Player

    public abstract class Character
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a character in the overworld.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Character.CharacterComparator
      Compares characters according to their y coordinate.
      static class  Character.CharacterState
      Represents the state of a character.
      static class  Character.Direction
      Represents the direction that a character is facing.
